name: The Lost Blade
description: Stuck on Mars, with only a blade and a time machine. You are lost on the red planet, isolated with nothing in sight. But in the year 2700, mars is showing signs of life. So humans have placed mech robots around Mars which emit high energy that your time machine can travel to. Destroy these mechs and you will be able to build all the parts for a teleporter to get back to Earth!
